name: Scarlet Labs
description:
Scarlet Labs is a VR educational game made during Unity education in Novska.

It is primarily made for HTC Vive but it can be played on the PC as well.

The goal of this game was to bring chemistry closer to people and help them learn something new through this fun and interactive project.

Team Lead, Game designer, Level Design: Ivana Jesih Kamber

3d models: Lucija Abramović, Petra Stojičić

Programmer: Abel Varalungović
